titles: A true relation of the conversion and baptism of Isuf the Turkish chaous, named Richard Christophilus In the presence of a full congregation, Jan. 30. 1658. in Covent-Garden, where Mr. Manton is minister. Imprimatur, Edm. Calamy.
author: White, Thomas, 1628-1698.
Dury, John, 1596-1680.
publisher: Printed by S. Griffin, and are to be sold by John Rothwell at the Fountain in Cheapside, and Thomas Vnderhill at the Bible in Pauls Church-yard,
notes: Author's note "To the reader" signed: Tho. White.
"To the Christian reader" signed: John Durie.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Christian converts from Islam --  Early works to 1800.
